name: @mizchi/ui
description: Pure MoonBit Virtual DOM library with React-like hooks

scripts.test: moon test --target js --build-only && bun target/js/debug/test/vdom/vdom.blackbox_test.js && bun target/js/debug/test/signals/signals.blackbox_test.js && bun target/js/debug/test/signals/dom/dom.blackbox_test.js && bun target/js/debug/test/signals/ssr/ssr.blackbox_test.js

author: mizchi
